com.usc.bill.service

Interface BillService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BillServiceImpl

    @Service
public interface BillService
    A common interface to handle a general business operations that concerns generating charges and applying payment for student
    Version:
    1.0 11/19/2017
    Author:
    WU, Alamri, STROUD

    • Method Detail

      • addPayment

        void addPayment(java.lang.String userId,
                java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                java.lang.String note)
         throws UserNotFoundException,
                NoStudentProfileFoundException,
                UserPermissionException
        to add a payment against the current student's bill
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of student where payment will be applied
        amount - a mount in dollar currency
        note - a reason for the payment
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the user associated with a given id is not existed in the system
        NoStudentProfileFoundException - if there is no student profile associated with user id existed in the system
        UserPermissionException - if the logged-in user has no permission accessing given id of user

      • generateEndTermCharge

        void generateEndTermCharge(StudentProfile studentProfile)
        to generate charges by the end of semester and calculate final amount in order to be preserved in the system for future record
        Parameters:
        studentProfile - a profile where the charge will be calculated
        See Also:
        StudentProfile

      • getAllCharges

        Bill getAllCharges(java.lang.String userId,
                   java.util.Date startDate,
                   java.util.Date endDate)
            throws NoStudentProfileFoundException,
                   UserPermissionException,
                   UserNotFoundException,
                   NoBillExistedException
        to get the charges and payment made within the range of dates given presented in Bill object
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of user that is associated with transaction
        startDate - a start date where transactions' dates fall after it
        endDate - an end date where transactions' dates fall before it
        Returns:
        bill consisted of student of profile along wiht charges, payment within the range of dates given
        Throws:
        NoStudentProfileFoundException - if there is no student profile associated with user id existed in the system
        UserPermissionException - if the logged-in user has no permission accessing given id of user
        UserNotFoundException - in case no user is logged in
        NoBillExistedException - if there is no bill existed for the given user id
        See Also:
        Bill

        to get all charges and payment associated with a given userId
        Parameters:
        userId - an id of user where the transaction made
        Returns:
        all transaction made that are associated with a given userId
        See Also:
        TransactionHistory

                                java.util.List<TransactionHistory> allTransactionHistory)
        to get the total balance from current charges and all transaction history by calculating charge against payment
        Parameters:
        currentCharges - charges of current semester
        allTransactionHistory - consists of all payment and charges
        Returns:
        the balance in respective to the payments made and past charges

      • getCurrentBill

        Bill getCurrentBill(java.lang.String userId)
             throws NoStudentProfileFoundException,
                    UserPermissionException,
                    UserNotFoundException,
                    NoBillExistedException
        to get the charges and payment made in the current semester presented in Bill object
        Parameters:
        userId - an id of user corresponding to student profile that
        Returns:
        bill consisted of student of profile along wiht charges, payment of current semester
        Throws:
        NoStudentProfileFoundException - if there is no student profile associated with user id existed in the system
        NoBillExistedException - if there is no bill existed for the given user id
        UserPermissionException - if the logged-in user has no permission accessing given id of user
        UserNotFoundException - if no user is logged-in
        See Also:
        Bill

      • getCurrentCharges

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigDecimal> getCurrentCharges(java.lang.String userId)
                                                                throws NoStudentProfileFoundException
        to get current charges with a given userId
        Parameters:
        userId - an id of user where the charges will be incurred
        Returns:
        map of current charges
        Throws:
        NoStudentProfileFoundException - if there is no student profile associated with user id existed in the system

      • loadTransactions

        void loadTransactions(java.lang.String filename)
               throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
                      java.lang.NullPointerException,
                      NoStudentProfileFoundException
        to load transactions contained in student record file that is formated as a JSON into the system datasource
        Parameters:
        filename - name of file where the record of transaction existed
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the given filename has improper format
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the file associated with a given filename doesn't exist
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the file associated with a given filename couldn't be parsed into JSONArray
        NoStudentProfileFoundException - if student with user id associated with transaction doesn't exist
